tossup_question: -   –  A train at rest has a length of 100 meters. At what speed, in terms of the speed of light, c, must it approach a tunnel of length 60 meters so that an observer at rest with respect to the tunnel will see that the entire train is in the tunnel at one time?
bonus_question: -  12)  – 	Which of the following medical applications makes use of x-rays?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Computed Tomography
X) Magnetic Resonance Imaging
Y) Positron Emission Tomography
Z) Ultrasound
